Artists.Name: Diego Rivera
Artists.Quote: As an artist I have always tried to be faithful to my vision of life, and I have frequently been in conflict with those who wanted me to paint not what I saw but what they wished me to see.

Artists.Name: Frida Kahlo
Artists.Quote: I paint flowers so they will not die.

Artists.Name: David Alfaro Siqueiros
Artists.Quote: Art is a weapon that penetrates the eyes, the ears, the deepest and subtlest human feelings.

Artists.Name: José Clemente Orozco
Artists.Quote: Art is Knowledge at the service of emotion

Artists.Name: Rufino Tamayo
Artists.Quote: Art is a means of expression that must be understood by everybody, everywhere.

Artists.Name: Leonora Carrington
Artists.Quote: You may not believe in magic but something very strange is happening at this very moment.

Artists.Name: Gabriel Orozco
Artists.Quote: I believe that a small action or a subtle gesture in life can change many, many things

Artists.Name: Francisco Toledo
Artists.Quote: My parents are migrants ; I'm more from the city than the country, but I always knew what the country was, and from there comes what I paint, though I do not come from a primitive world.

Artists.Name: José Guadalupe Posada
Artists.Quote: Death is democratic. At the end, regardless of whether you are white, dark, rich or poor, we all end up as skeletons.
